output:
(Shalom, wǒ jiǎng shì sī fǎ lǐ yán jiǎo shì, wǒ jiǎng shì wǒmen de mèng yì, pí yùn de dà tiān, yī jiǎo yī jiǎo. Wǒmen dōu huì jiǎng shì yī qiē, dào zhè lǐ de shì jiàn yì. Dàn shì, wǒmen yě kě néng huì gù chū yī qiē, yīn wèi wǒmen de jiāo yù shì yī zhǒng xīn de. Wǒmen kě néng gòu jiǎng shì yī qiē, dào zhè lǐ de shì jiàn yì. Nǐmen hěn gāoxìng, nǐmen hěn gāoxìng, nǐmen hěn gāoxìng...)


Note: The translation is provided in Simplified Chinese characters, which are used in mainland China. If you need Traditional Chinese characters, please let me know.

(nǐ hǎo, wǒ jiào ān tuǒ, jiù yǒu yī gè jiào zhōng xué xiào, wǒ huì jiǎng yì zhù yī gè gèng xīn de shù jù wén jiàn shè de gōng zuò, zhè ge gōng zuò shì yǔ Jerry hé wǒmen hé zuò de. fǎ yì shì xīn rén de shēn huó zhōng yǒu dàduō shǎo de rén bù gèi dào zhī dào tāmen de qǔ qǔ hé jiàn gōng gōng zuò. yīn wèi, duì yú yǒu xiǎng fù kě ài gòu de zhèng zhì jiào zhù rén bù kě yǐ gòu jiǎng, dàn bù shì, tāmen jiù shì shì yǒu xiǎng fù kě ài gòu de rén cháng dà duō, hěn hǎo yì.
